data.name: PFW Blackboard Dark
data.description:
Something to not assault your eyes.

Any shortcomings please share. I update as I come across something that it is intrusive.

If there's an interest I'd be glad to put this up on Github for Community contribution.

Known Issue:
 - Certain Multiple Choice Questions during Quiz / Exam doesn't take styling

data.name: jvc dark theme
Prime Video Recolor Plus
data.description: Change the colors of Prime Video and add more if you like! Important: If you're having issues updating this style first uninstall it, then reload the page and install it again after selecting your settings. I highly recommend using Stylus over Stylish for both Firefox and Chrome and other supported browsers, mainly because that is what i use for my browsers when i create these styles. Here's a link to the add-on: Stylus for Firefox Stylus for Chrome If you have any issues, questions or feedback, you can contact me here Adam-J-Frost@outlook.com. If you would like to help me out, you can donate to me here: Donate via Ko-fi. I hope you like this style and thank you for using it!

user.name: AdamJFrost
user.about: I like making styles for sites i use. I try to keep them up-to-date as much as i can. If you would like to donate and help me out you can use this link to Donate via Ko-fi. Thanks for using my styles and Thanks if you Donated!
